Useful Applications & Tools

collection online tool

07 Mar 2020

Last modified on 01 Oct 2021.

  • Online tools
    • Images
    • Office
  • Multi-platforms
  • Windows
  • Linux
  • MacOS
  • Education
  • Chrome extension

Online tools

Images

  • Compress images: PNG, JPG.
  • Remove background / Transparent photos: online png tools, lunapic.
  • iloveimg: resize, crop, compress, rotate.
  • SVG free.
  • Side by side images: this tool.

Office

  • Convert PDF to Word (conserve format): freepdfconverter.
  • PDF Editor online free: pdfescape
    • Edit text: sejda
    • Change metadata: bluepdf
    • View pdf’s metadata: pdfyeah
  • Etherpad – a highly customizable Open Source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
  • Text recognition (OCR): newocr

Multi-platforms

  • GitKraken – git client for ubuntu (better than Github Desktop when importing local)
  • GoldenDict – dictionaries + its dictionaries.
  • Google Play Music Desktop Player (support Youtube Music with custom controllers, online only).
  • Jitsi Meet – More secure, more flexible, and completely free video conferencing.
  • Mailspring – Email client.
  • Typora – WYSWYG markdown editor.
  • VirtualBox – virtual machine.
  • XDM – download manager.

Windows

  • Big Stretch Reminder – free simple reminder tool that prompts a user to take regular breaks and helps prevent the symptoms of Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI).
  • cmder (Console Emulator) – (update 11/20: should use Windows Terminal with dropdown support) drop-down terminal for windows. My setting file.
  • DeepL – Quickly translate app (by using Ctrl + C + C).
  • Everything – an alternative to Spotlight in Mac. You can search any thing (app, docs, files,…) in your computer with hotkeys.
  • FastStone Capture – screen recorder.
  • Lingoes – dictionary (used alongside with GoldenDict) – its dictionaries.
  • LockHunter – find what application/process is preventing us from deleting some folder/file.
  • ScreenToGif – screen recorder and auto convert to gif file.
  • Unikey – Vietnamese input method on Windows.

Linux

  • Cheese (Appstore) – webcam for linux.
  • Foliate (Appstore) – Book reader.
  • gThumb (Appstore) – photo viewer + quick editing tools.
  • Guake Terminal – drop-down terminal (more settings)
  • Kazam (Appstore) – Screen Recorder.
  • Lotion – Unofficial Notion client for linux (online only)
  • Lutris – playing games on linux.
  • Notejot (Appstore) – sticky note.
  • OpenComic – read offline comic with many supported files (zip, folder containing images,…)
  • Rhythmbox (Appstore) – Music player on Linux (custom hotkeys).
  • Workrave – a program that assists in the recovery and prevention of Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI).

MacOS

  • iTerm2 – drop-down terminal.
  • Time Out – a program that assists in the recovery and prevention of Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI).

Education

  • DeepL – “better than google translate” app for Windows. You can use Ctrl + C + C to quickly translate a word or phrase.
  • GoldenDict – global dictionary (multi-platform). Its dictionaries.
  • Lingoes – Global dictionary for Windows. Its dictionaries.
  • QTranslate – quickly translate any word / phrase and also their pronunciation by using hotkeys (for example, you can use Ctrl + E to hear the pronunciation and Ctrl + Q to see the translation). The data is obtained from various sources including deepl and google translate.
  • Raindrop – bookmark to read later the articles (like Pocket)

Chrome extension

  • AVIM – Vietnamese input method
  • Flash Video Downloader – get any video download link.
  • Hush – private bookmarking
  • Mate – Quick translater.
  • Print Friendly & PDF – print any web page into pdf.
  • TabCloud – save current tab list
